login.title: Consult my bracelet
login.welcome: Welcome! Log in to view the services performed on your bracelet.

error.title: Connection
error.message: An error occurred while trying to identify.

numero.label: Where to find the number of my bracelet?

bookingid.label: I prefer to use my reservation number

scan.title: How to scan my bracelet?
scan.msg1: If your phone is NFC compatible, you can scan your bracelet to enter its code.
scan.msg2: Bring your phone closer to your wristband and wait for the confirmation of your wristband code.

numero.title: Where to find the number of my bracelet?
numero.msg1: On the back of your bracelet, there is a 14-digit identifier.
numero.msg2: We use the first 4 digits as well as the last 4 digits.

bookingid.title: Where can I find my reservation number?

list.label: You will find your reservation number on:
list.item1: the confirmation email received following your reservation
list.item2: the Planet Center Parks app in "My stay " and then "My reservation "
list.item3: a home page of your MyCenterParcs area or the section "Detail of my reservation "

bookingid.msg: If your booking has not been made via the Center Parcs website or the call center, please identify yourself directly with your bracelet number.

uid.label: Bracelet number
uid.unknown: Your bracelet number could not be recognized.

infos.title: Infos
infos.presenting: All your coupons now digitized and grouped on your bracelet.

list.msg1: All your coupons now digitized and grouped on your bracelet.
list.msg2: Remember to plan your treatment at the spa reception
list.lbl3: For the gift-giving activities offered as part of the Early Booking Offer :
list.msg3: Meet at the park reception for their planning and booking

infos.subscription: I subscribe to bracelet alerts, an email or SMS for each use

errors.technical-fetch-msg: An error occurred while fetching data
